product_name: Louis Garneau Merit Bike Jacket - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: The feature-rich Louis Garneau Merit bike jacket balances moisture management with moderate warmth, and provides a barrier against wind and protection against wet weather. Lightweight, durable ripstop front shell fabric offers high wind resistance and good breathability; Durable Water Repellent finish enhances water resistance and quick drying. Stretch polyester at back and underarms provides high breathability, moisture wicking performance and 4-way stretch comfort. Microfleece lining in front, upper back and sleeves adds warmth while it pulls moisture from skin to help keep you dry and comfortable. Full-length front zipper with internal windflap; soft chin guard protects sensitive skin. Includes hand pockets and a large rear, side-access pocket; all pockets have hidden zippers. Drawcord hem and elastic cuffs. Reflective detailing on front and back increases visibility. Louis Garneau Merit jacket provides a semi-relaxed fit for easy layering; the jacket is also a great choice for cross-country ski adventures. Closeout.
